overview:
Kamren Scott has experience in photography, journalism, development, marketing and graphic design.

As Director of Marketing at PersonalWeb, she oversees business development, search engine optimization, social media, design and branding. She also works with the development team to generate and implement strategies and ideas, working as a liaison between the marketing and development teams.

Specifically, she designs all print and web graphics for the company and its products, writes or edits all of PersonalWeb’s corporate and product identity content, develops and maintains the corporate website, and edits the company product site, StudyPods.

She has degrees in journalism, graphic design and photography. She appreciates airy design and tight fonts.

degrees.subject: Journalism
degrees.institution: The University of Texas at Tyler
